backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the ICP backend that handles user profile management, contact form submissions, photo/video storage, and access-controlled admin operations using blob storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: adding 'Teacher, Writer and Social Worker' as a subtitle beneath the founder's name on both the About page and Home page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON file containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key content of each component, page, hook, and config file.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app with a root div and a module script tag loading main.tsx, titled 'Trust Portal'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for Home, About, Programs, Donations, Gallery, Contact, and Admin pages under a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Manavdeep Seva Trust branding, quick navigation links, founder and office contact details, copyright notice, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the Navigation header, a main content area via Outlet, and the Footer for all pages.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation header with the trust logo, desktop and mobile menus for six main links, and a conditionally shown Admin link when the user is authenticated via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing login/logout state via AuthClient and exposing identity, login status, and helper booleans to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend operations including uploading/deleting photos and videos, fetching all photos/videos, and submitting a contact form via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a warm, earthy CSS custom property color palette for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Static About page displaying the organization's founder profile, history, and mission sections with icons and styled layout components.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page that allows authenticated users to upload and delete photos and videos via tabbed forms, with Internet Identity login gating and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a hero section, contact information (founder, address, phone), and a form that submits via the `useContactForm` mutation hook with a success notification.
frontend/src/pages/Donations.tsx: Donations page displaying impact statistics, preset donation amounts with descriptions, and payment method information for Manavdeep Seva Trust.
frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx: Gallery page with tabbed Photos/Videos sections; static photos are hardcoded from local assets while dynamic content is fetched via `useGetAllPhotos` and `useGetAllVideos` hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home landing page featuring a hero banner, founder profile section for Anjani Dwivedi, and links to programs and contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/Programs.tsx: Programs page that renders a grid of six initiative cards (Education, Environment, Healthcare, Community, Skills, Agriculture) with icons, descriptions, and detail lists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via oklch, fonts, border radius, shadows, keyframes) and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (version 39) recording the architecture, known issues, and list of implemented features for the Manavdeep Seva Trust charitable organization website.
